name: Lucky the Cat
description:
Guide Lucky the Cat through the forest. Collect coins and powerups. Avoid dogs and falling in the pits.

--Controls--

Left and right to move left and right, respectively

Up arrow to jump

Hold down shift to sprint

Space to cough up fish bones

--Credits--

@CDH5x3 - Programming and Sound effects

Ultimate Chaos - Art

This was made for Weekly Game Jam 114.

Note: If main menu is unresponsive, press S to start.
